Real Madrid-Galatasaray: the official teams!
Real Madrid and Galatasaray face each other on Wednesday night on the fourth day of Group A Champions League. But with which teams aligned by Zin√©dine Zidane and Fatih Terim?
06 Nov 2019, 19:02 by Florian Sermaise

Their futures depend on it. Tonight, on the occasion of the fourth day of Group A Champions League, Real Madrid and Galatasaray actually play their future European. Last in the pool, the Turkish squad counts just one point on the clock and any other result that a victory in Santiago Bernab√©u would condemn. Compulsory exploit against the men of Zinedine Zidane. The French technician and his team, second with four units on the clock, have made the Champions League their favorite playground in recent years. Impossible, then, to imagine the White House to take the door in the chick phase. While waiting to know the outcome of this game almost chopper, discover the teams aligned by the two coaches, Zinedine Zidane and Fatih Terim.

Marcelo + 33 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport
